name: WineTrivia
0:
”Alexa, ask Wine Trivia”
”Alexa, play Wine Trivia”
”Alexa, start Wine Trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine trivia
des: Wine Trivia is a fun wine trivia test for consumers and professionals a like. Test your worldwide knowledge on viticulture and wine making. It works to the same adherences as any other Alexa Trivia Skill. It is designed to broaden the user's knowledge of wine. The questions are derived directly from wine certification programs like CSW, WSET, and Court of Sommeliers. Certification students can use these questions like multiple choice flash cards.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
